hints.content:
We start at $4{:}18$ when Andrew finishes his homework.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 3:30, 3:45, 4:00, 4:15, and 4:30 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled tick mark at 4:18. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Andrew starts his homework we go **left** ${32}$ minutes from $4{:}18$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{4{:}18} -{} &\goldE{3}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}15\\\\
{4{:}15} -{} &\purpleD{15}\text{ minutes} = 4{:}00\\\\
4{:}00 -{} & \blueD{10}\text{ minutes} = {3{:}50} \\\\
3{:}50 -{} & \maroonD{4}\text{ minutes} = \greenD{3{:}46} \\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 3:30 to 4:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 3:30, 3:45, 4:00, 4:15, and 4:30 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving right to left from the 4:18 tick mark to the 3:46 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 4:18 tick mark and ends at the 4:15 tick mark and is labeled minus 3. The second arrow starts at the 4:15 tick mark and ends at the 4:00 tick mark and is labeled minus 15. The third arrow starts at the 4:00 tick mark and ends at the 3:50 tick mark and is labeled minus 10. The fourth arrow starts at the 3:50 tick mark and ends at the 3:46 tick mark and is labeled minus 4. !

hints.content:
Andrew starts his homework at $\greenD{3{:}46} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{3{:}46}$?

When Andrew starts his homework, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 3 and 4 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 9. !

question.content:
Andrew spends $32$ minutes doing his homework. He finishes his homework at $4{:}18 \text { p.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Andrew started his homework?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 5 and the long hand on the 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4b15b59ab8274bbba0c60d5f6bdba3cf4e5fd060)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 3 and 4 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/00566e1eddaeecaf3e207fbb24858ad4533c126a)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 3 and 4 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a663efedf8d3327238eef1a73fab21d8682834d4)
